candidates.name: Hamish McDouall
candidates.why_elect: I will continue to represent Whanganui with energy, fairness, gravitas and passion. I have proven experience, a strong belief in democracy, a track record of generating innovative ideas, the ability to lobby successfully, a history of managing diverse voices around council enabling positive decisions, and I've been Whanganui's loudest cheerleader.
candidates.why_stand: While I have been mayor our district has grown both in terms of population and GDP. We have preserved what we treasure, our reputation has been burnished, and there's a buzz here. However there's unfinished business—major capital projects to be finished and government money to be attracted here.
